AUTHOR: El Laggron
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing my cog! You can see a list of commands by typing `[p]roleset`. The bot need the `Manage roles` permissions t work. If you meet any bug or problem, let me know on my support server: https://discord.gg/WsTGeQM
NAME: bettermod
SHORT: Autorole for members on-join, linked to invites
DESCRIPTION: Allow to make links between roles and invites. Bot will give a role on-join to users, depending on the invite he used
